item.title: PREDICT AD CLICKS USING LOGISTIC REGRESSION AND XG-BOOST
item.description:
In this project, we will predict Ads clicks using logistic regression and XG-boost algorithms. I will assume that i have been hired as a consultant to a start-up that is running a targeted marketing ad campaign on Facebook. The company wants to analyze customer behavior by predicting which customer clicks on the advertisement.

Project Objectives

  1. Assess the performance of trained classifier models using various KPIs such as accuracy, precision and recall
  2. Perform data cleaning, feature engineering and visualization
  3. Train and test an XG-Boost and Logistic Regression models in Scikit-Learn

item.title: TITANIC SURVIVAL PREDICTION USING MACHINE LEARNING
item.description:
Data Source: https://www.kaggle.com/c/titanic

In this project, we will build, train and test a machine learning model to predict titanic survivors based on their features such as age, number of siblings, and ticket class. We will explore two machine learning algorithms, namely: (1) logistic regression classifier model and; (2) Naive Bayes classifier model.

LEARNING OBJECTIVES

  1. Perform data cleaning, feature engineering and visualization
  2. Build, train and test a logistic regression classifier model in Sklearn
  3. Understand the theory and intuition behind logistic regression classifier models
